metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010025 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** GNU Libc current is affected by: Mitigation bypass. The impact is: Attacker may guess the heap addresses of pthread_created thread. The component is: glibc. NOTE: the vendor's position is "ASLR bypass itself is not a vulnerability."

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This CVE is disputed, marking as not-affected.

criterions.comment: eglibc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
